DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the clinical pregnancy rate per embryo transfer in oocytes recipients obtained after ovarian stimulation during the luteal phase of oocytes donors . This study will be performed in egg recipients and donors but this type of treatment is meant to be implemented in fertility preservation patients
DOC.brief_title: Evolutive Potential of Embryos Obtained From Oocytes After Luteal Phase Ovarian Stimulation
DOC.criteria: premenopausal women, 1835 years old, FSH levels < 10 mIU/ml; AFC> 10 regular cycles BMI < 28 signed informed consent Recipients: Infertile women eligible for oocytes donation BMI < 35 Signed informed consent form Polycystic ovarian syndrome, gonadotropins allergy Recipients: Women eligible for oocytes donation BMI >35 Uncontrolled Endocrine Pathology
